CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Note that , in stark contrast to PCDTBT : PC71BM system in which thermal annealing reduced the photovoltaic parameters ( FF , J SC , and V OC ) , 22 the performance of all PCDSeBT - based devices for this study is considerably improved as a result of thermal treatment.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDTBT
2. PC71BM
3. PCDSeBT

These are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PCDTBT
2. PC71BM
3. PCDSeBT

These are the relevant "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph. I have removed any entities that were not clearly materials.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PC71BM |
| PCDSeBT |

Here are the valid "Material Name" entities presented as a Markdown table. I have made sure to use the exact same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Note that , in stark contrast to PCDTBT : PC71BM system in which thermal annealing reduced the photovoltaic parameters ( FF , J SC , and V OC ) , 22 the performance of all PCDSeBT - based devices for this study is considerably improved as a result of thermal treatment.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDTBT
2. PC71BM
3. FF (Fill Factor)
4. J SC (Short-Circuit Current Density)
5. V OC (Open-Circuit Voltage)
6. PCDSeBT

These are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph. They are properties or parameters used to describe the performance of organic solar cell devices.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. FF (Fill Factor)
2. J SC (Short-Circuit Current Density)
3. V OC (Open-Circuit Voltage)

These are the "Material Property" entities in the given paragraph. They are specific parameters used to describe the performance of organic solar cell devices. The other entities (PCDTBT, PC71BM, and PCDSeBT) are material names, but they are not material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| FF |
| J SC |
| V OC |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Note that , in stark contrast to PCDTBT : PC71BM system in which thermal annealing reduced the photovoltaic parameters ( FF , J SC , and V OC ) , 22 the performance of all PCDSeBT - based devices for this study is considerably improved as a result of thermal treatment.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. FF (Fill Factor)
2. J SC (Short-Circuit Current Density)
3. V OC (Open-Circuit Voltage)

These are all photovoltaic parameters mentioned in the context of the performance of PCDSeBT-based devices.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

In the given paragraph, the only entities that clearly refer to the Value of Material Property are:

1. FF (Fill Factor)
2. J SC (Short-Circuit Current Density)
3. V OC (Open-Circuit Voltage)

These are the specific properties of the PCDSeBT-based devices, and their values are affected by thermal treatment. Other entities like PCDTBT, PC71BM, and PCDSeBT are not values of material properties, so they should be disregarded in this context.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| FF (Fill Factor) |
| J SC (Short-Circuit Current Density) |
| V OC (Open-Circuit Voltage) |
